scripts.dev: npm install && cargo watch -i "{**/static/**,**/templates/input.css,docker/**,db/**}" -s "npx tailwindcss -i templates/input.css -o static/styling/main.css && cargo run"
scripts.debug: npm install && npx tailwindcss -i templates/input.css -o static/styling/main.css && cargo build && xcopy static target\debug\static\ /e /y
scripts.release: npm install && npx tailwindcss -i templates/input.css -o static/styling/main.css && cargo build --release && xcopy static target\release\static\ /e /y
